src:
Sama-Sama Berbahaya, Waspadai Perbedaan Penyakit Campak dan Rubella
03 Nov 2019, 09:10 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Campak dan rubella merupakan dua penyakit yang jadi perhatian utama pemerintah. Keduanya dikenal ganas karena cukup mematikan dan menyebabkan cacat. Indonesia pun telah berkomitmen mencapai eliminasi penyakit campak (measles) dan pengendalian penyakit rubella (Congenital Rubella Syndrome) pada 2020.
Dikutip dari Kementerian Kesehatan Republik Indonesia, penyakit Campak dan Rubella tak bisa diobati seperti penyakit pada umumnya. Pengobatan yang diberikan kepada penderita hanya bersifat pendukung. Namun tak perlu khawatir, karena kedua penyakit ini bisa dicegah dengan imunisasi.
Oleh sebab itu, Indonesia memberikan imunisasi campak sebagai salah satu program imunisasi nasional. Sayangnya masih banyak orang yang salah mengartikan antara penyakit campak dan rubella. Mereka menilai dua penyakit ini sama, tetapi sebenarnya berbeda.
Melansir Bola.com, berikut rangkuman perbedaan penyakit campak dan rubella, beserta gejala dan penyebabnya.
text:
Equally Dangerous, Beware of Differences in Measles and Rubella
Nov 3, 2019, 09:10 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Measles and rubella are two diseases that are the main concern of the government. Both are known to be malignant because they are quite deadly and cause defects. Indonesia also has committed to achieve elimination of measles (measles) and control of rubella (Congenital Rubella Syndrome) in 2020.
Quoted from the Ministry of Health of the Republic of Indonesia, Measles and Rubella can not be treated as a disease in general. Treatment given to sufferers is only supportive. But not to worry, because both of these diseases can be prevented by immunization.
Therefore, Indonesia provides measles immunization as one of the national immunization programs. Unfortunately there are still many people who misinterpret between measles and rubella. They considered these two diseases the same, but actually different.
Launch Bola.com, following a summary of the differences between measles and rubella, along with their symptoms and causes.
